basic.color: Flower color yellow or dark red, leaf turnning red with adequate sunlight

maintenance.soil: Sphagnum moss or mixture of peat and perlile, replace once a year
maintenance.sunlight: Full sun in spring, autumn and winter, in summer put in places with scattered light and good ventilation, may result in dark green leaves under insufficient light
maintenance.watering: Like wet environments, water thoroughly after soil surface dries, reduce water in winner dormancy
maintenance.fertilization: Like low concentration fertilizers, may nourish itself by capturing insects, also can apply liquid fertilizers at 1/4 recommanded strength on leaves in every month
maintenance.pruning: Remove flower stem, diseased and rotten leaves timely
